channel.title: NPC Spawning not staying? [317]
channel.description:
I have a 317.
I used this code:
[code]spawn = 2745 3200 3263 0 0 0 0 0 0[/code]
That basically spawns TzTok-Jad in the Lumby sheep field. HOWEVER, he doesn't stay in there. He will follow me around, then kill me. Then he disappears? As soon as I die he disappears and the only way to re-spawn him is stop, and start the server again.
I don't know if I have to set his walk option right... or what.
So as clarification:
The two problems are that I am trying for him to stay on that precise x and y cord, so he can't move (as is easy to kill >=) ), but as soon as he spawns he follows me around. (even over water and through buildings... Don't want that.
Then when he kills me he disappears, and the only way for him to re spawn is for me to restart the server?
Any ideas on what I did wrong?

item.title: NPC Spawning not staying? [317]
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

He follows you around and kills you because he’s set to be aggressive towards players that get near him

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Spawning not staying? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

Code I have:

spawn = 2745	3200	3263	0	3263	3200	3200	3263	2

In NPC.cfg (he has a re spawn of 1 second for testing :P)

npc = 2745	TzTok-Jad			702		250		1

And yet he still disappears and will only reappear after a server reset >>

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Spawning not staying? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Wiplayer Wiplayer
item.description:
@Wiplayer wrote:

Will try that. I found his code, but I will have to figure out what part will make him dissappear.

Could it be this?:

if(plr.jadStage != 1 && plr.jadStage != 3 && plr.jadStage != 5 && plr.tzStage != 1 && plr.rangeStage != 1){
						server.playerHandler.players[Player].updateRequired = true;
						server.playerHandler.players[Player].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
						plr.setAnimation(plr.GetBlockAnim());
}

Read full topic

Oh good point. Any idea where his process is so I can make him respawn?

But what about me coding him to stay on one tile. Edit that in his process too?

@mod cody; I have. I just need to code him to stay on only that tile, without him following or moving lol
